tabo_welcome: TABO - the first Kazakhstan online fashion destination
tabo_mission: 'Tabo,' translated as 'what you seek,' encapsulates our mission perfectly
welcome_world: Welcome to the world of fashion
shop_description: Welcome to TABO SHOP! We offer a wide range of high-quality products to meet your fashion needs. Explore our collection and find the perfect items for your style.
promotionEnded: Hurry up to buy! The promotion will end in:
faq_answer_1: TABO SHOP is an online retail store that offers a wide range of high-quality fashion products, including clothing, accessories, and more. We strive to provide our customers with trendy and affordable options.
faq_question_2: How can I place an order?
faq_answer_2: To place an order with TABO SHOP, simply browse our website, select the items you want, and add them to your cart. Then, proceed to the checkout page to provide your shipping and payment details.
faq_answer_3: Yes, we offer international shipping to a wide range of countries. During the checkout process, you can select your country and check the available shipping options and costs.
faq_question_4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq_answer_4: TABO SHOP accepts various payment methods, including credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express), PayPal, and Apple Pay. You can choose your preferred payment method during the checkout process.
faq_question_5: How can I track my order?
faq_answer_5: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a confirmation email with a tracking number and a link to the courier's website. You can use the tracking number to monitor the status and location of your package.
zara_brand_description: Icon of minimalism and elegance, epitomizing timeless luxury.
tommy_hilfiger_brand_description: Brand that embodies boldness, energy, and a passion for fashion.
calvin_klein_brand_description: Symbol of contemporary fashion, inspiring endless refinement.
tabo_fashion_enthusiasts: We're fashion enthusiasts at Tabu, where style is your unique expression.
contact_us_description: Feel free to get in touch with us.
about_our_shop_text: Welcome to TABO SHOP! We offer a wide range of high-quality products to meet your fashion needs. Explore our collection and find the perfect items for your style.
officeInfo: Our office is located next to Expo on Turkestan Street. We are delighted to welcome you to our store Kabanbay Batyr 65. If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact us. We look forward to serving you at our convenient Turkestan Street location near Expo.
